data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
data.value:
select * from ( -- Modulbaum-Maske select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Modulbaum-Maske', Pfad = 'Fallbearbeitung -> Modul ' + MOD.ShortName + ' -> ' + isnull(TRE5.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE4.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE3.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE2.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE1.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE0.Name,''), Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA inner join XModulTree TRE0 on TRE0.ClassName = CLA.ClassName left join XModulTree TRE1 on TRE1.ModulTreeID = TRE0.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE2 on TRE2.ModulTreeID = TRE1.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE3 on TRE3.ModulTreeID = TRE2.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE4 on TRE4.ModulTreeID = TRE3.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE5 on TRE5.ModulTreeID = TRE4.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModul MOD on MOD.ModulID = TRE0.ModulID left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where isNull(TRE0.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE1.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE2.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE3.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE4.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE5.Active,1) = 1
union all
-- Submaske select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA2.ClassName, Typ = 'Submaske', Pfad = 'Fallbearbeitung -> Modul ' + MOD.ShortName + ' -> ' + isnull(TRE5.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE4.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE3.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE2.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE1.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE0.Name,''), Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA inner join XClassReference REF on REF.ClassName = CLA.ClassName inner join XClass CLA2 on CLA2.ClassName = REF.ClassName_Ref and CLA2.BaseType = 'KiSS4.Gui.KissUserControl' inner join XModulTree TRE0 on TRE0.ClassName = CLA.ClassName left join XModulTree TRE1 on TRE1.ModulTreeID = TRE0.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE2 on TRE2.ModulTreeID = TRE1.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE3 on TRE3.ModulTreeID = TRE2.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE4 on TRE4.ModulTreeID = TRE3.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE5 on TRE5.ModulTreeID = TRE4.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModul MOD on MOD.ModulID = TRE0.ModulID left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where isNull(TRE0.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE1.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE2.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE3.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE4.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE5.Active,1) = 1
union all
-- Menu-Maske select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Menu-Maske', Pfad = 'Hauptmenu -> ' + isnull(MEN5.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN4.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN3.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN2.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN1.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN0.Caption,''), Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA inner join XMenuItem MEN0 on MEN0.ClassName = CLA.ClassName left join XMenuItem MEN1 on MEN1.MenuItemID = MEN0.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN1.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XMenuItem MEN2 on MEN2.MenuItemID = MEN1.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN2.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XMenuItem MEN3 on MEN3.MenuItemID = MEN2.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN3.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XMenuItem MEN4 on MEN4.MenuItemID = MEN3.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN4.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XMenuItem MEN5 on MEN5.MenuItemID = MEN4.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN5.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where isNull(MEN0.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN1.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN2.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN3.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN4.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN5.Visible,1) = 1
union all
-- Dialog select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Dialog', Pfad = 'Aufruf via ' + isnull(REF.ClassName,'?'), Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA left join XMenuItem MEN on MEN.ClassName = CLA.ClassName inner join XClassReference REF on REF.ClassName_Ref = CLA.ClassName left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where BaseType like '%Dialog%' and MEN.MenuItemID is null and isNull(MEN.Visible,1) = 1
union all
-- Modul Navigatoren select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Modul-Navigatoren', Pfad = '', Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where BaseType like 'KiSS4.Common.KissModulTree'
union all
-- Spezialrecht select Modul = isNull(MOD.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = RGT.RightName, Typ = 'Spezialrecht', Pfad = '', Modulname = MOD.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = Usertext from XRight RGT inner join XClass CLA on CLA.ClassName = RGT.ClassName left join XModul MOD on MOD.ModulID = CLA.ModulID
union all
-- ********************************** -- Masken, die sonst nirgens sind
select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Sonstige-Masken', Pfad = 'Nicht aufgeführte und nicht verwendete Masken', Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where CLA.ClassName NOT IN (
-- vvvv beginn obere selects vvvvvv -- select InternerName from ( -- Modulbaum-Maske select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Modulbaum-Maske', Pfad = 'Fallbearbeitung -> Modul ' + MOD.ShortName + ' -> ' + isnull(TRE5.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE4.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE3.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE2.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE1.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE0.Name,''), Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA inner join XModulTree TRE0 on TRE0.ClassName = CLA.ClassName left join XModulTree TRE1 on TRE1.ModulTreeID = TRE0.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE2 on TRE2.ModulTreeID = TRE1.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE3 on TRE3.ModulTreeID = TRE2.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE4 on TRE4.ModulTreeID = TRE3.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE5 on TRE5.ModulTreeID = TRE4.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModul MOD on MOD.ModulID = TRE0.ModulID left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where isNull(TRE0.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE1.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE2.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE3.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE4.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE5.Active,1) = 1
union all
-- Submaske select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA2.ClassName, Typ = 'Submaske', Pfad = 'Fallbearbeitung -> Modul ' + MOD.ShortName + ' -> ' + isnull(TRE5.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE4.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE3.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE2.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE1.Name + ' -> ','') + isnull(TRE0.Name,''), Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA inner join XClassReference REF on REF.ClassName = CLA.ClassName inner join XClass CLA2 on CLA2.ClassName = REF.ClassName_Ref and CLA2.BaseType = 'KiSS4.Gui.KissUserControl' inner join XModulTree TRE0 on TRE0.ClassName = CLA.ClassName left join XModulTree TRE1 on TRE1.ModulTreeID = TRE0.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE2 on TRE2.ModulTreeID = TRE1.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE3 on TRE3.ModulTreeID = TRE2.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE4 on TRE4.ModulTreeID = TRE3.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModulTree TRE5 on TRE5.ModulTreeID = TRE4.ModulTreeID_Parent left join XModul MOD on MOD.ModulID = TRE0.ModulID left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where isNull(TRE0.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE1.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE2.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE3.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE4.Active,1) = 1 AND isNull(TRE5.Active,1) = 1
union all
-- Menu-Maske select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Menu-Maske', Pfad = 'Hauptmenu -> ' + isnull(MEN5.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN4.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN3.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN2.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN1.Caption + ' -> ','') + isnull(MEN0.Caption,''), Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA inner join XMenuItem MEN0 on MEN0.ClassName = CLA.ClassName left join XMenuItem MEN1 on MEN1.MenuItemID = MEN0.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN1.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XMenuItem MEN2 on MEN2.MenuItemID = MEN1.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN2.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XMenuItem MEN3 on MEN3.MenuItemID = MEN2.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN3.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XMenuItem MEN4 on MEN4.MenuItemID = MEN3.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN4.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XMenuItem MEN5 on MEN5.MenuItemID = MEN4.ParentMenuItemID AND MEN5.ParentMenuItemID is not null left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where isNull(MEN0.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN1.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN2.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN3.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN4.Visible,1) = 1 AND isNull(MEN5.Visible,1) = 1
union all
-- Dialog select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Dialog', Pfad = 'Aufruf via ' + isnull(REF.ClassName,'?'), Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA left join XMenuItem MEN on MEN.ClassName = CLA.ClassName inner join XClassReference REF on REF.ClassName_Ref = CLA.ClassName left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where BaseType like '%Dialog%' and MEN.MenuItemID is null and isNull(MEN.Visible,1) = 1
union all
-- Modul Navigatoren select Modul = isNull(MOD2.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = CLA.ClassName, Typ = 'Modul-Navigatoren', Pfad = '', Modulname = MOD2.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XClass CLA left join XModul MOD2 on MOD2.ModulID = CLA.ModulID where BaseType like 'KiSS4.Common.KissModulTree'
union all
-- Spezialrecht select Modul = isNull(MOD.ShortName,'-'), InternerName = RGT.RightName, Typ = 'Spezialrecht', Pfad = Usertext, Modulname = MOD.Name, ModulID$ = CLA.ModulID, Kommentar = CLA.Description from XRight RGT inner join XClass CLA on CLA.ClassName = RGT.ClassName left join XModul MOD on MOD.ModulID = CLA.ModulID
-- ^^^^^^ ende obere selects ^^^^^ -- ) FOUND
)
) T
where 1=1 -- T.Modul not in ('NV','FIB') --- AND ({edtSearchInklNV} = 1 OR T.Modul != 'NV') --- AND ({edtSearchInklFIB} = 1 OR T.Modul != 'FIB') --- AND ({edtSearchNotShown} = 1 OR T.Typ != 'Sonstige-Masken') --- AND InternerName LIKE '%' + {edtSucheClassName} + '%' --- AND ModulID$ = {edtSucheModul}
order by case when Modul = '-' then 1 else 0 end,Modul,InternerName
